mapper.select: select sum(score) from QuestInExer where exerciseId=#{exerciseId}

select QuestInExer.questionId, QuestInExer.orderId,Question.dbName,Question.questionClass,Question.title, QuestInExer.score from QuestInExer join Question on Question.id=QuestInExer.questionId where QuestInExer.exerciseId=#{exerciseId} AND Question.deleteflag=false order by QuestInExer.orderId ASC

select QuestInExer.questionId, QuestInExer.orderId, QuestInExer.exerciseid as zexerciseid,Question.dbName,Question.questionClass,Question.title, QuestInExer.score as zscore,a.score as sscore from QuestInExer join Question on Question.id=QuestInExer.questionId left JOIN (SELECT *from stuanswer where stuanswer.studentid=#{stuId}) as a on questinexer.questionId = a.questionId where QuestInExer.exerciseId=#{exerciseId} AND Question.deleteflag=false order by QuestInExer.orderId ASC
select max(orderId) from QuestInExer where exerciseId=#{exerciseId}

select Question.id, Question.questionClass, Question.dbName, judgeDatabase.describe, Question.title, Question.content, Question.analysis from Question, judgeDatabase, QuestInExer where Question.dbName = judgeDatabase.name and Question.deleteflag = false and Question.id = QuestInExer.questionId and QuestInExer.exerciseId = #{exerciseId} and QuestInExer.orderId = #{orderId}

select Exercise.id, Exercise.name as e_name, Exercise.describe, Exercise.teacherId as t_id ,Teacher.name as t_name from Exercise, Teacher, QuestInExer where Exercise.teacherId=Teacher.id and QuestInExer.exerciseId = Exercise.id and QuestInExer.questionId = #{questionId} and Exercise.deleteflag=false
